DOC.brief_summary: The overall purpose study determine whether family history psychosis associate alter cannabinoid system . This test study individual without family history psychosis compare response delta 9-tetrahydrocannabinol ( THC ) , probe cannabinoid system . We hypothesize , compare control family history psychosis , individual family history psychosis alter response THC .
DOC.brief_title: Probing Cannabinoid System Individuals With Family History Psychosis
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria FHP : Exposure cannabis least lifetime Medically psychiatrically healthy base screen Having one relative confirm psychotic disorder Exclusion Criteria FHP : Current lifetime major DSMIV Axis I disorder Current lifetime treatment ( least 6 month ) psychotropic medication major psychiatric neurological illness Major unstable medical illness might impact safety subject study Cannabis naive IQ le 85 Less high school diploma educational equivalent Pregnancy lactation Major current recent ( < 6 week ) psychosocial stressor . Inclusion Criteria FHN : Exposure cannabis least lifetime Medically psychiatrically healthy base screen Exclusion Criteria FHN : Having family member psychosis Current lifetime major DSMIV Axis I disorder Current lifetime treatment ( least 6 month ) psychotropic medication major psychiatric neurological illness Major unstable medical illness might impact safety subject study Cannabis naive IQ le 85 Less high school diploma educational equivalent Pregnancy lactation Major current recent ( < 6 week ) psychosocial stressor .
